sql.query: UPDATE versions SET lazy_load = 1 WHERE product_type = 'plugins.themes'
UPDATE filter_groups SET input_type = 'class::classes.submission.Submission' WHERE input_type = 'class::classes.monograph.Monograph'
UPDATE filter_groups SET output_type = 'class::classes.submission.Submission' WHERE output_type = 'class::classes.monograph.Monograph'
UPDATE filter_groups SET input_type = 'class::classes.submission.Submission[]' WHERE input_type = 'class::classes.monograph.Monograph[]'
UPDATE filter_groups SET output_type = 'class::classes.submission.Submission[]' WHERE output_type = 'class::classes.monograph.Monograph[]'

UPDATE publications SET series_position = ps.setting_value FROM publication_settings ps WHERE publications.publication_id = ps.publication_id AND ps.setting_name = 'seriesPosition' AND publications.series_position is null

UPDATE publications as p SET p.series_position = ( SELECT ps.setting_value FROM publication_settings as ps WHERE p.publication_id = ps.publication_id AND ps.setting_name = 'seriesPosition' ) where p.series_position is null
